snippet.title: Nivalis - Behind the Scenes (4K 60fps)
snippet.description:
Join us on a tour behind the scenes of Nivalis, the cyberpunk slice-of-life sim in development at ION LANDS. Learn how characters come to life with motion capture and take a peek at new environments.

About Nivalis:
Grow your business, manage restaurants and nightclubs, make friends and enemies, buy and decorate apartments, go fishing and maybe even find love in Nivalis, the city that stretches from the ocean to the clouds.

Wishlist Nivalis
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1488490/Nivalis/
Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/nivalis
Nivalis on Twitter: https://twitter.com/NivalisGame

Social Links:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ionlands
Instagram: https://instagram.com/ionlands
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/ionlands
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/ionlands
